title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 504.7 - Sources of funds to pay interest
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 504.7 - Sources of funds to pay interest

State Regulations

Any interest payable by the authority pursuant to this Part
shall be paid only from the same accounts, funds, or appropriations that are
lawfully available to make the related contract payment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
504.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
